datasources.name: Azure Metrics
datasources.description: Ship your Azure metrics to logz.io

information.title: Important note about data consumption
information.text: Azure may charge additional fees for using this integration. [Read more about Azure API costs](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/api-management/).

information.title: Connect your Microsoft Azure app to Logz.io
information.text: To get started with Microsoft Azure and Logz.io, youâ€™ll need to create an app and connect it. [See our step-by-step guide](https://docs.logz.io/user-guide/azure-native-integration.html).

params.name: resource.group.ids
params.label: Resource group names (Optional)
params.description: If left empty, Logz.io will pull all the resource groups under the subscription

params.name: resource.types
params.label: Resource Type (Optional)
params.description: Send metrics that include any of these resource types.
params.hint: To send all resource types of the project select 'All services'
